source.782724c6:
from sklearn import preprocessing
label_encoder = preprocessing.LabelEncoder()
df['Category'] = label_encoder.fit_transform(df['Category'])
df['Region'] = label_encoder.fit_transform(df['Region'])
source.40db670d:
x = df[['Category','Region','Year']]
y = df['Value']
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
x_train,x_test,y_train,y_test = train_test_split(x,y,test_size=0.3,random_state=101)
source.f47f21bd:
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
linear = LinearRegression()
linear.fit(x_train,y_train)
linear.score(x_test,y_test)
source.6c21bcbc:
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
forest = RandomForestRegressor()
forest.fit(x_train,y_train)
forest.score(x_test,y_test)
source.6fbe35ab:
plt.plot(y_test,predictions)
plt.xlabel('Actual')
plt.ylabel('Predicted')
plt.title('ACTUAL VS PREDICTED')
source.2a8570f0: MACROREGIUNEA UNU , MACROREGIUNEA PATRU and MACROREGIUNEA DOI are the regions with vast surface areas of forest
source.453b1017: # PREDICTING SURFACE AREA IN UPCOMING YEARS
source.118e5835:
CONCLUSION :
1.The Surface Area for Wood is increasing , only in the years 2007-2008 , there had been some decrement in the woods but after that there is rise the surface area for wood
2.MACROREGIUNEA TREI has the highest wood surface area in ROMANIA
3.Most Of the Wooden Forest Surface Area lies about 250 unit acres , with some exceptions ranging upto 2000 acres
source.a3927613: Okay that's good enough accuracy for test data
